name: Squareman (Retro)
description:
A platformer designed for handhelds!

I wanted to make a platformer for handhelds I had (GB, 3DS), so I made this!

The story goes:

You are an athlete, Squareman, but there's a guy called Mr. Stealer which sucks at being athlete but wants to win the race! He invents stuff such as machines to defeat Squareman, he's a cheater! He goes as far as to kidnap your best friend, Randy!

It's made with GB Studio.

Note: I used assets from other people, such as:

https://github.com/DeerTears/GB-Studio-Community-Assets https://rekkimaru.itch.io/gb-studio-dungeon-tileset-8x8 https://reyhanpanci256.itch.io/basic-gb https://horstenvault.itch.io/park-tile-set https://victorvaldez.itch.io/gb-studio-tracks-vol-1
https://victorvaldez.itch.io/gb-studio-tracks-vol-2
https://crimson-lycan-yt.itch.io/gb-studio-resource-pack

It's available for the GameBoy, 3DS, and also for PC, for people that want to just... Play it!
